name: Age Line
effect: Prevents people above or below a certain age from access to a target

name: Anapneo
effect: Cleared target's airway by vanishing blockages

name: Animagus Spell
effect: Used as part of the ritual to become an Animagus
hand: Place wand tip over caster's heart
incantation: Amato Animo Animato Animagus(ah-MAH-toh ah-NEE-moh ah-nee-MAH-toh an-ah-MAY-jus)

name: Anti-Disapparition Jinx
effect: Prevented Disapparition within a certain area

name: Arrow Shooting Spell
effect: Conjures a shooting arrow from the caster's wand

name: Badgering
effect: Turns target human into a badger

name: Bat-Bogey Hex
creator: Miranda Goshawk(mid-20th century)
effect: Transforms target's bogeys into bats that fly out of the victim's nose

name: Bewitched Snowballs
effect: Bewitches snowballs to follow and harass a designated target

name: Boggart-Banishing Spell
effect: Turned a Boggart into something amusing

name: Broom jinx
effect: Makes a broomstick attempt to buck its rider off

name: Bubble Spell
effect: Created a stream of non-bursting bubbles

name: Caterwauling Charm
effect: Sets off a high-pitched shriek if entered

name: Cauldron to Sieve
effect: Turns a cauldron into a sieve

name: Cauldron to badger
effect: Transforms a cauldron into a badger

name: Cribbing Spell
effect: Assists the caster in cheating on written papers

name: Cruciatus Curse
effect: Excruciating pain, insanity if victim was subjected for too long

name: Curse of the Bogies
effect: Nasty cold and an extremely runny nose

name: Cushioning Charm
creator: Elliot Smethwyck (1820)
effect: Places a cushioning effect on an object

name: Dangling Jinx
creator: Severus Snape
effect: Suspends people by the ankles in the air

name: Disintegration spell
effect: Blew up and disintegrated the target

name: Drought Charm
effect: Dried up small bodies of water

name: Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx
effect: Caused boils to spell 'SNEAK' on the face of a traitor

name: Everte Statum
effect: Makes opponent stumble, Causes sharp pain

name: False memory spell
creator: Mnemone Radford c. 1900s (possibly)
effect: Implanted a false memory in the victim's mind

name: Flagrante Curse
effect: Causes objects to burn on contact

name: Flipendo Maxima
creator: Badeea Ali and Ben Copper
effect: Knocks the target back with greater force than the Knockback Jinx

name: Freezing Charm
effect: Stops movement and actions of the target

name: Fur spell
effect: Causes fur to grow on someone

name: Hair-Thickening Charm
effect: Caused hair to grow longer and thicker

name: Homing spell
effect: Offensive spells that caused damage; would follow their target

name: Homonculous Charm
effect: When cast onto a map, it enabled tracking the movements of every person in the mapped area

name: Homorphus Charm
effect: May temporarily change a transformed werewolf back into their human form (according to Gilderoy Lockhart, it cures lycanthropy)

name: Horcrux-making spell
creator: Herpo the Foul (possibly)
effect: Prepared a receptacle to become a Horcrux

name: Horn tongue hex
effect: Transforms target's tongue into a horn

name: Horton-Keitch Braking Charm
creator: Basil Horton and Randolph Keitch (c. 1929)
effect: Allow broomsticks to brake more easily

name: Hurling Hex
effect: Causes a broomstick to attempt to hurl its rider off

name: Inanimatus Conjurus Spell
effect: Alters the design of a room

name: Insect Hex
effect: Gives target insectoid qualities for a short period of time

name: Intruder Charm
effect: Detects intruders and sounds an alarm

name: Knockback Jinx
light: Blue, orange, yellow red, purple or white

name: Langlock
creator: Severus Snape
effect: Stuck tongue to roof of the mouth

name: Legilimency Spell
effect: Let caster see into the mind of another person

name: Liberacorpus
creator: Severus Snape
light: Flash of light of unknown colour

name: Lumos Duo
creator: Possibly Levina Monkstanley (between 1772 and 1993)
effect: Focused beam of light from end of wand
hand: Slide wand across ground and point

name: Lumos Maxima
effect: Produced very bright light from wand tip

name: Meteolojinx Recanto
effect: Caused weather effects caused by incantations to cease

name: Ministry of Magic Fog
effect: Produced special fog for the concealment of certain locations

name: One-Eyed Witch Spell
effect: Revealed secret passages, particularly the One-Eyed Witch Passage

name: Orbis
effect: Sucks the target into the ground

name: Pain extraction spell
creator: Isidora Morganach
effect: Removed pain from the target, Could empower those who absorbed it

name: Animation Charm
hand: Point wand at target (when animating individual target), Hold wand aloft or wave (when animating multiple things)

name: Protego Diabolica
effect: Created protective black fire that only burnt the caster's enemies whilst leaving their allies unharmed

name: Pus Squirting Hex
effect: Caused yellowish pus to squirt from one's nose

name: Reparifarge
effect: Reverses the effects of an incomplete Transformation spell

name: Repello Inimicum
effect: Repels enemies; if used with Protego Maxima and Fianto Duri, it disintegrates anything that comes in contact with the barrier

name: Revelio Charm
effect: Revealed secrets about a person or object

name: Reverse Spell
effect: Showed the previous spells cast by a wand
hand: Hold tip of wand to targeted wand

name: Reverte
effect: Returns objects to their original positions or states

name: Rose Growth
effect: Accelerates the growth of a rosebush

name: Rowboat spell
effect: Causes a rowboat to propel itself
hand: Tap twice on boat with wand

name: Salvio hexia
hand: Downwards, palm of opposite hand held outward

name: Sea Urchin Jinx
effect: Makes tiny spikes erupt all over the victim

name: Seize and pull charm
effect: Pulled something towards the caster or vice versa

name: Shield Charm
effect: Reflected spells and blocked physical forces
light: Invisible on its own, reflected light of spell

name: Shield penetration spell
effect: Used to break down magical shields
hand: Point wand to the place where the spell is desired to hit

name: Skurge Charm
effect: Cleans ectoplasm, Frightens ghosts and other spirits

name: Smashing Spell
effect: Explosive, destroyed everything in its range

name: Sonorous Charm
effect: Emitted a magnified roar from the tip of the wand

name: Specialis Revelio
effect: Revealed spells cast on objects or potions

name: Sponge-Knees Curse
effect: Causes the target's legs to become spongy

name: Taboo
effect: When a word was spoken, the caster was alerted and protective enchantments around the speaker were weakened

name: Teacup to tortoise
effect: Transforms a teacup into a tortoise

name: Teapot to tortoise
effect: Transforms a teapot into a tortoise

name: Toenail-growing hex
creator: Severus Snape
effect: Causes its victim's toenails to grow alarmingly fast

name: Tracking spell
effect: Revealed traces of magic, including footprints and track marks

name: Transmogrifian Torture
effect: Tortured, possibly by transfiguring the target to death

name: Unbreakable Vow
effect: Magical vow, that was fatal if broken

name: Unlocking Charm
creator: Ancient African sorcerer (possibly); first brought to Britain by Eldon Elsrickle in the early 1600s

name: Unsupported flight
creator: Lord Voldemort
effect: Allowed a witch or wizard to fly unaided

name: Vacuum cleaner spell
effect: Cleans an object like a vacuum cleaner

name: Ventus Duo
effect: Creates a stronger jet of wind compared to Ventus

name: Verdillious
effect: Caused the wand tip to burn like a sparkler whilst damaging an opponent

name: Verdimillious Charm
effect: Do damage to opponents, Reveal hidden things

name: Verdimillious Duo Spell
effect: Do damage to an opponent, Reveal hidden objects
